name: Inverted Spear of Heaven
description: A legendary tool that forces the stoppage of any innate technique. The ultimate counter to sorcery.
howToObtain: Legendary drop from Hidden Inventory Boss or Trade
tips: Use 'Throat Gouge' to silence enemy casting for 3 seconds.

name: Playful Cloud
description: A three-section staff that embodies pure physical force. The only special grade tool with no cursed technique.
howToObtain: Defeat Toji Fushiguro in the Raid
tips: Damage scales purely off your Strength stat, not Cursed Energy.

name: Executioner's Sword
description: A sword that kills anyone it cuts without fail. Manifested by Higuruma's domain.
howToObtain: Temporarily obtained by winning a Death Sentence case with Judgeman
tips: You only have one swing. Don't miss.

name: Split Soul Katana
description: A blade that cuts directly at the soul. Ignores physical durability.
tips: Effective against tanky enemies like Hanami or Mahito.

name: Dragon Bone
description: A thick blade that stores and releases kinetic energy from impacts.
howToObtain: Rare find in Kyoto School Exchange event chests
tips: Block attacks to charge up the blade, then release for explosive damage.

name: Slaughter Demon
description: A dagger infused with cursed energy. Good for beginners.
howToObtain: Given by Gojo during the tutorial quest
tips: Keep it until you find a Grade 1 weapon.
